page.title: 12Pupil Opinions of E Kilbride
page.content: ....East Kilbride is a brilliant place to live. There are so many different things to do for the young and elderly alike. The town is clean and tidy with good shops near one's home as well as an excellent Town Centre shopping area which makes it a popular attraction for visitors. It is a happy place. ....There is plenty to do. We have :- sports centres, swimming baths, a lot of swingparks and open grassland, a nature trail and country park, three golf courses, many football, rugby and hockey pitches as well as many indoor youth clubs, discos etc. ....Some of the things not so good :- vandalism, rubbish being dumped in the open countryside or in some of the small burns in the area, insufficinet soundproofing in terraced houses and flats, air pollution from industry, no professional theatrical shows or galas
